name: Fire Of The Apes
description:
Fire Of The Apes v1.1 (c) 2014

code & level design & tools by Giuseppe Perniola

story & gfx & sfx by Giuseppe Masia

Fire Of The Apes is a Wolfenstein clone where you are an ape who wants to escape from a dangerous and strange world...

Use cursors keys to move A and D to strafe and Space in proximity of walls to
light up your matches. Use scissors to cut through some of the walls and go through levels.
